text: Sweet Sensation is the fourth album by American R&B; and soul singer Stephanie Mills. Released in 1980, produced by James Mtume and Reggie Lucas. The album features her biggest hit, "Never Knew Love Like This Before" which peaked within the top ten of the US Billboard Hot 100 and won two Grammy Awards for Best R&B; Vocal Performance, Female and Best R&B; Song, the former becoming her first career Grammy win.
